name: Dominik Dier
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I'm transforming requirements into a web app using mainly react, react-redux and redux-saga. Sometimes I also have to talk to IE 11 (without using Babel, etc.), but we won't get friends.
what_can_i_contribute: Using react and svg to create a brush-chart from scratch. How to make this chart fancier using d3-shape.
